item.title: 泽连斯基的助手在战争批评后会见中国高级外交官
item.description: 就在乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）加强批评中国政府协助俄罗斯发动战争后数小时，乌克兰总统办公室主任和外交政策负责人与中国最高外交官举行了罕见的会晤。【原文：The head of Ukraine’s presidential office and the country’s foreign policy chief held a rare meeting with China’s top diplomat just hours after President Volodymyr Zelenskiy ramped up his criticism of Beijing for aiding Russia’s war.】

item.title: PayPay 提供数字工资支付，促进无现金贸易
item.description: 日本最大的基于二维码的支付应用 PayPay Corp. 增加了一项功能，允许公司以数字方式向员工支付部分工资，这是日本推动无现金交易的最新尝试。【原文：Japan’s largest QR-code based payment app PayPay Corp. has added a function that allows companies to pay employees part of their salaries digitally, the latest attempt at boosting the country’s cashless transactions.】

item.title: Old Mutual 将于 2025 年开设新的南非银行
item.description: Old Mutual Ltd. 将于明年第一季度推出南非最新的银行，这将加剧这个 85% 的居民都在贷款机构开设账户的国家的竞争。【原文：Old Mutual Ltd. will unveil South Africa’s newest bank in the first quarter of next year, intensifying competition in a nation where 85% of residents have accounts with lenders.】

item.title: 土耳其股票投资者担心利率正常化将终结 440% 的涨幅
item.description: 在超低利率时代，土耳其的证券交易所成为居民保护其储蓄免受通胀飙升影响的首选途径。现在，随着紧缩货币政策将持续到明年，股票市场的繁荣正在迅速消退。【原文：During the era of ultra-low interest rates, Turkey’s stock exchange became the preferred way for residents to protect their savings from surging inflation. Now, with tighter monetary policy seen lasting well into next year, the equities boom is fading fast.】

item.title: 巴斯夫寻求改革，降低股息，专注于核心部门
item.description: 巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）正在重新制定战略，目标是降低股息支付，同时在未来回购大约 40 亿欧元（45 亿美元）的股票。【原文：BASF SE is resetting its strategy, targeting lower dividend payments alongside future share buybacks in the region of €4 billion ($4.5 billion).】

item.title: 电动汽车市场放缓，电池制造商 SK On 意图裁员
item.description: 韩国电池生产商SK On Co.正在向员工提供自愿措施，以缩减员工人数，因为该行业正努力应对电动汽车销售放缓的问题。【原文：South Korean battery producer SK On Co. is offering employees voluntary measures meant to shrink its workforce, as the industry grapples with electric vehicle sales’ slowdown.】

item.title: 政治局誓言为实现目标提供财政支持，中国股市大涨
item.description: 在国家最高领导人誓言为实现年度经济和社会发展目标提供财政支持后，中国股市延续涨势。【原文：Chinese stocks extended their rally after the nation’s top leaders vowed fiscal support to achieve its annual economic and social development goals.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在七周来最糟糕的一天后回升
item.description: 英国二十英镑纸币。摄影师：Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：British twenty pound notes. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 韩国对中国产不锈钢展开倾销调查
item.description: 韩国对从中国进口的不锈钢板发起了反倾销调查，这增加了对来自世界第二大经济体的产品设置新贸易壁垒的可能性。【原文：South Korea has launched an anti-dumping investigation into imports of stainless steel plates made in China, raising the prospect of new trade barriers to products from the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 泰国警告水坝溢洪将导致重要旅游城市发生洪灾
item.description: 泰国警告说，随着暴雨持续不断、河流泛滥和水坝达到最高容量，该国著名的旅游胜地之一将发生更多洪灾。【原文：Thailand warned of more floods in one of the nation’s popular tourist destinations as heavy rains continue, rivers overflow and dams reach peak capacity.】

item.title: 世界上最受欢迎的植物油不再是最便宜的了
item.description: 由于最大种植国的产量缩减，而主要替代品供应充足，棕榈油失去了世界上最廉价食用油的地位。【原文：Palm oil has lost its position as the world’s cheapest edible oil, thanks to shrinking output in the biggest growers and plentiful supply of the main alternative.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 能源罢工影响乌克兰经济增长，欧洲复兴开发银行下调乌克兰经济增长预测
item.description: 据欧洲复兴开发银行（European Bank for Reconstruction and Development）称，俄罗斯对乌克兰能源基础设施的攻击使乌克兰经济遭受重创，迫使其在建设替代能源的同时不得不依赖更加昂贵的进口。【原文：Ukraine is taking an economic hit from Russian attacks on its energy infrastructure, forcing it to rely on more expensive imports as it builds alternative sources, according to the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.】

item.title: PGIM 首席执行官希望 "真正关注 "中国消费行业
item.description: PGIM 的首席执行官对中国最新的经济刺激措施表示欢迎，但他说，中国还需要做更多工作来重新平衡经济，使之向消费方向发展。【原文：PGIM’s chief executive welcomed China’s latest stimulus efforts, but said the country needs to do more to rebalance the economy toward consumption.】

item.title: 反对党警告：随着债务增加，泰国面临信用评级下调的风险
item.description: 泰国最大的反对派组织称，如果政府不控制其巨额债务以支撑东南亚第二大经济体，泰国将面临信用评级下调的 "非常令人担忧 "的风险。【原文：Thailand runs a “very alarming” risk of credit rating downgrades if the government doesn’t rein in its massive pile of debt to prop up Southeast Asia’s second-largest economy, according to the country’s biggest opposition group.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行警告称澳大利亚巨额养老金对稳定构成风险
item.description: 澳大利亚央行警告说，该国 3.9 万亿澳元（约合 2.7 万亿美元）养老金行业的迅猛增长给该国金融体系的稳定带来了新的风险。【原文：Australia’s central bank warned that the surging growth of the nation’s A$3.9 trillion ($2.7 trillion) pensions industry has created new risks to the stability of the country’s financial system.】

item.title: 日本贸易振兴机构针对中国钢铁提出反倾销建议
item.description: 据日本经济产业省的一位官员称，该省正在寻求扩大反倾销税的征收范围，以涵盖经第三国转运的中国钢铁和其他产品。【原文：Japan’s Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry is seeking to broaden the scope of anti-dumping duties to cover Chinese steel among other products routed via third countries, according to a ministry official.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡左翼领导人面临改变国际货币基金组织协议的严峻考验
item.description: 斯里兰卡新总统上任后的任务是为仍在遭受该国有史以来最严重经济危机残余影响的公民提供救济。现在，困难来了：让贷款人配合。【原文：Sri Lanka’s new president took office with a mandate to bring relief to citizens still burdened by the remnants of the country’s worst-ever economic crisis. Now comes the hard part: Getting the lenders to play along.】

item.title: 尽管美联储大幅减息，日元对美元汇率仍跌至 145 点
item.description: 日元贬值至 9 月初以来的最低水平，因为即使在美联储降息之后，收益率差缩小的速度仍不确定。【原文：The yen weakened to its lowest level since early September, as the pace of narrowing yield differentials remains uncertain even after the Federal Reserve cut rates.】

item.title: 寒流袭击南部，澳大利亚小麦作物再遭重创
item.description: 严重的霜冻威胁着澳大利亚南部和东南部的麦田，预计这些地区的小麦产量将占主要发货国小麦产量的 10%以上，这加剧了人们对西部地区干旱的担忧。【原文：Severe frosts have threatened fields in Australia’s south and southeast that were expected to account for more than 10% of the major shipper’s wheat production, compounding concerns over dryness in western regions.】

item.title: 了解未来不会让你赚钱
item.description:
即使交易者已经掌握了明天的消息，他们的表现仍然会很糟糕。真正重要的是他们下了多大的赌注。【原文：

Traders can still perform badly even if they already have tomorrow’s news. What really matters is how much they bet.

】

item.title: 顶级银行家通过投奔私人信贷追逐高薪
item.description:
越来越多的杠杆融资银行家跳槽到私人资本公司，以寻求更多的财富和在蓬勃发展的市场中工作的承诺。【原文：

More and more leveraged-finance bankers are jumping ship for private capital firms in the hunt for greater fortunes and the promise of working in a booming market. 

】

item.title: 贝莱德的朱厄尔称股市可应对盈利下调
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：While global corporate earnings estimates for the rest of the year appear optimistic, stock markets are likely to be able to absorb moderate downgrades for now, according to BlackRock Inc.’s Helen Jewell.】

item.title: 肯尼亚中央银行拖延导致肯尼亚债券交易所二级交易计划搁浅
item.description: 东非债券交易所（East African Bonds Exchange）称，由于在将其系统与肯尼亚中央银行的系统集成方面出现延误，其平台上的二级交易尚未开始。【原文：The East African Bonds Exchange says secondary trading on its platform is yet to commence because of delays in integrating its system to the Central Bank of Kenya’s.】

item.title: 新西兰财政部对政府债务轨迹表示担忧
item.description: 新西兰财政部的一位高级顾问说，随着人口老龄化加剧结构性预算赤字，新西兰在未来几十年将面临债务增加的问题，这对财政政策是一个重大挑战。【原文：New Zealand faces rising debt in coming decades as an aging population exacerbates a structural budget deficit, in a major challenge for fiscal policy, a top Treasury adviser said.】

item.title: 碧桂园债券持有人批准推迟支付人民币债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，碧桂园控股有限公司已获得债券持有人的批准，将其九元人民币债券的支付时间推迟六个月，从而使该开发商有更多的时间来制定在岸债务重组计划。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. has won bondholders’ approval to push back payments on its nine yuan bonds by six months, according to people familiar with the matter, giving the developer more time to map out an onshore debt overhaul.】

item.title: 基本金属走低，中国经济刺激政策疑云重重
item.description: 基本金属和铁矿石下跌，因为投资者质疑中国本周早些时候出人意料的刺激计划能否重振亚洲最大的经济体，包括房地产市场。【原文：Base metals and iron ore fell as investors questioned whether China’s surprise stimulus package earlier this week would revive Asia’s largest economy, including the real estate market.】

item.title: 新加坡娱乐公司 Neon 据说考虑明年上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，沉浸式娱乐集团 Neon 正在考虑在新加坡进行首次公开募股，募集资金可能高达 5 亿新元（约合 3.89 亿美元）。【原文：Immersive entertainment group Neon is considering an initial public offering in Singapore that may raise as much as S$500 million ($389 million), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度借款计划可能推动市场反弹
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 越南称 SpaceX 的 Starlink 计划投资 150 亿美元
item.description: 越南政府援引美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）高级副总裁蒂姆-休斯（Tim Hughes）与越南共产党总书记杜林（To Lam）的会面内容称，该公司拟在不久的将来向越南投资 150 亿美元，用于星链（Starlink）卫星服务。【原文：SpaceX is proposing to invest $15 billion in Vietnam tied to its Starlink satellite service in the near future, the government said, citing a meeting between the company’s Senior Vice President Tim Hughes and the Communist Party’s General Secretary To Lam.】
